an4.31:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these four situations. When these situations come about, any god or human who takes advantage of them will soon acquire great and abundant wealth.
an4.31:1.3: Living in a suitable region, relying on true persons, being rightly resolved in oneself, and past merit.
an4.31:1.4: These are the four situations. When these situations come about, any god or human who takes advantage of them will soon acquire great and abundant wealth.
